CONSTITUTION.SECTION1_TITLE: Main Goals and Objectives of the Association

S1.LINE1: To assist members in achieving financial self-reliance.
S1.LINE2: To create opportunities for savings and investment through interest-free business activities.
S1.LINE3: To establish mutual cooperation, good relations, transparency, and a sense of responsibility among the members.

S2.LINE1: The application form must include name, address, mobile number, signature, and nominee's name.
S2.LINE2: The applicant must pay the required amount equivalent to the designated share value.
S2.LINE3: The applicant must accept membership with a long-term commitment and planning.

S3.LINE1: A 5-member executive committee will be formed based on the opinions of the members.
S3.LINE3: Responsibilities: Administrative tasks, investment decisions, and policy-making.

S4.LINE1: Any profit or loss of the association will be equally distributed among all members.
S4.LINE2: All members will be equally responsible for bearing profits and losses.

CONSTITUTION.SECTION5_TITLE: Policy for Inclusion of New Members

S5.LINE1: A new person may be included as a member subject to approval by the majority of existing members.
S5.LINE2: A new member must collect the membership form after paying an amount equal to the accumulated capital of the designated share.

S6.LINE1: The accumulated funds will be invested in profitable and low-risk sectors.
S6.LINE2: The 5-member executive committee will explore potential investment sectors and analyze profitability and risks.
S6.LINE3: General members may provide advice regarding investments.
S6.LINE4: Final investment decisions must be taken in an emergency meeting with the presence of all members and after considering all opinions.

CONSTITUTION.SECTION7_TITLE: Policy for Conducting and Modifying Activities

S7.LINE1: The association's activities will be carried out according to the established policies.
S7.LINE2: In unforeseen situations, majority-based decisions to protect members' interests will also be considered policy.

S8.LINE1: All activities of the association will be conducted according to the policies specified and approved on official stamp documents.
